item.title: A Haunting Lady Gaga and a Glammed-Up Addams Family Arrive at Nevermore
item.description: The ‘Wednesday’ costume designers detail the significance behind Gaga’s look and dish on all that went into the suits and gowns showcased at Nevermore’s season two fundraising gala.
